channel.title: [24/7] InsaneCraft.com [Survival] [Bukkit] [iConomy] [PvP] [+More]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img851.imageshack.us/img851/7003/1111sl.png[/img]
Welcome! InsaneCraft is all about a true survival experience! We strive to keep everyone happy and provide a true survival game-play experience. [/CENTER]
We require registration on our forum and a simple application including your IGN and why you would like to be apart of InsaneCraft. We require this because we feel it helps draw out true players (not griefers) who would like to be apart of a community. If it's to much to ask, we're sorry for wasting your time.
Registration Link: [url=http://insanecraft.com/index.php?action=register]Here[/url] Member Applications: [url=http://insanecraft.com/index.php?board=11.0]Here[/url]
You may also log into the server to check it out, although you won't be able to build or destroy.
[CENTER]General Information: [/CENTER]
Dedicated Hosting Plenty of RAM, upgradeable 24/7 Uptime (Minus Minecraft / Bukkit Updates) Server Economy (iConomy) - Coins [I]PvP Enabled[/I] [I]Stealing Allowed[/I] PvP/Stealing withe specific rules (you'll learn during tutorial) Regios for buying and selling regions Read more on the website! [url=http://www.insanecraft.com]InsaneCraft - Minecraft Survival Server[/url]
[CENTER]Current Plugins: [/CENTER] [URL=http://"http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/mech-torchlight-v0-1beta-torches-emit-light-while-held-818.19977/"]Torch Light[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/edit-sec-admn-worldedit-4-6-world-editing-de-griefing-860.62/"]WorldEdit[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/admn-sec-web-mcbans-v2-9-1-complete-kick-ban-global-ban-system-818.94/"]McBans[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/tp-herospawn-spawn-first-time-users-in-a-different-location-v0-2-860.20851/"]HeroSpawn[/URL] | |[URL=http://"http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/sec-lockette-v1-3-8-simple-chest-and-door-lock-no-databases-561-818.4336/"]Lockette[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/econ-iconomy-5-0-1-eruanna-985.40/"]iConomy[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/mech-fun-fruitful-v0-3-1-drop-apples-and-cocoa-and-more-from-trees-and-crops-860-928.21735/"]Fruitful[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/econ-dailybonus-1-4-iconomy-login-bonus-766.12841/"]DaileyBonus[/URL] | [CENTER]Commands Available for Use: [/CENTER] /spawn | /clear (clears inventory) | /clear -a (clears inventory plus quickbar) | /me | /motd | /rules | /call | /online | /list | /pm | /msg | /r /reply (for quick reply last person who PM'd you)

item.title: [24/7] InsaneCraft.com [Survival] [Bukkit] [iConomy] [PvP] [+More]
item.dc:creator: @VeryInsane VeryInsane
item.description:
@VeryInsane wrote:

[CENTER]

Welcome! InsaneCraft is all about a true survival experience!
We strive to keep everyone happy and provide a true survival game-play experience.
[/CENTER]

We require registration on our forum and a simple application including your IGN and why you would like to be apart of InsaneCraft. We require this because we feel it helps draw out true players (not griefers) who would like to be apart of a community. If it’s to much to ask, we’re sorry for wasting your time.

Registration Link: Here
Member Applications: Here

You may also log into the server to check it out, although you won’t be able to build or destroy.

[CENTER]General Information:
[/CENTER]

Dedicated Hosting
Plenty of RAM, upgradeable
24/7 Uptime (Minus Minecraft / Bukkit Updates)
Server Economy (iConomy) - Coins
PvP Enabled
Stealing Allowed
PvP/Stealing withe specific rules (you’ll learn during tutorial)
Regios for buying and selling regions
Read more on the website! InsaneCraft - Minecraft Survival Server

[CENTER]Current Plugins:
[/CENTER]
Torch Light | WorldEdit | HelpMe | AdminChat | McBans | HeroSpawn | Permissions | BedRespawn | Minecart Mania | XCraft Gate | Regios |Lockette | iConomy | Fruitful | DaileyBonus | Paid2Mine | ChestShop | MobBounty | Prefixer | ColorMe | Scheduled Announcer

[CENTER]Commands Available for Use:
[/CENTER]
/spawn | /clear (clears inventory) | /clear -a (clears inventory plus quickbar) | /me | /motd | /rules | /call | /online | /list | /pm | /msg | /r /reply (for quick reply last person who PM’d you)
